mapper.select: select b.BGoalTitle as "bGoalTitle",to_char(r.startDate,'yyyy-mm-dd') as "startDate", to_char(r.endDate+1,'yyyy-mm-dd') as "endDate", d.completeTime as "isComplete",m.mGoalTitle as mGoalTitle from BTMGoal b inner join BTMRecord r on b.bGoalNum = r.bGoalNum full join (select btmRecordNum,count(completeTime) as completeTime from dayRecord group by btmRecordNum) d on r.BRecordNum = d.BTMRecordNum inner join MidGoal m on b.mGoalNum = m.mGoalNum where r.memberId = #{userid} order by r.startDate desc
